message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our amazing product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $90. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I really like the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraint, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $82. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $78. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I'm offering the product to you for $81. It's the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $79.50. Can you consider this price?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $80.50. This is my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make the deal.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $79.75. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go any higher than $80, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to stay firm on this price. I'm offering the product to you for $79.90. This is my last offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make one more offer: $79.00. If you can meet me at this price, I'll consider the deal.
